plot: The evil Dr. Wheelo has resurrected his brain into a robot and now desires to inhabit the body of the world's strongest warrior. This means he must face Son Goku and company in a fight for Goku's life.
insert_song: "Piccolo-san Daisuki" (ピッコロさんだ～いすき♡) by Masako Nozawa
